name: guardflow-extension
description: Prevent accidental secret leaks to ChatGPT, Claude, and other AI services

scripts.build:all: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.package:chrome: npm run build:chrome && cd dist-chrome && zip -r ../guardflow-chrome.zip . && cd ..
scripts.package:firefox: npm run build:firefox && cd dist-firefox && zip -r ../guardflow-firefox.zip . && cd ..
scripts.package: npm run package:chrome && npm run package:firefox

author: Guardflow
